about.title: The Team Behind the Learning Revolution
about.subtitle: We are a multidisciplinary team of innovators, educators, and technologists passionate about transforming human potential through Artificial Intelligence.

history.title: Our Story
history.subtitle: From a shared vision to an AI-powered learning platform. We were born to close the digital skills gap with practical, measurable, and responsible training.
history.start_2023_title: April 29, 2023 â€” Sube Academ-IA is born
history.start_2023_desc: We took the first step with the purpose of democratizing AI knowledge to transform society, helping people reinvent themselves with concrete tools.
history.milestone_2023_desc: We served as external evaluators for the Ministry of Science and contributed to ChileValora roles. We have trained 10+ prestigious universities since 2023.
history.milestone_2024_desc: We won the first public AI tender from the State of Chile, brought AI to Rapa Nui, and created our Competencies for the AI Era system.
history.milestone_2025_desc: Co-founders of the first Chilean Association of Artificial Intelligence for Sustainable Development (ACHIADS). Part of the Ministry of Science technical board for the AI Bill and speakers to the G9 University Network.

mvv.title: Mission, Vision and Values
mvv.subtitle: We are a pioneering AI-First company in LATAM.
mvv.mission_desc: Transform companies, institutions and people, elevating them to the next level through the perfect blend of natural intelligence and artificial intelligence to achieve augmented intelligence.
mvv.vision_desc: Democratize AI knowledge to change society, delivering concrete tools that allow people to reinvent themselves and do what they truly love.
mvv.values_desc: Excellence, Constant Innovation, Integrity and a real Commitment to the success of each of our students and partners.

values.v2: Ethics, security and privacy by design

header.title: Our Methodology
header.subtitle: ARES-AI and the 13 competencies for the AI era

ares.title: ARES-AI Framework
ares.description: An Agile, Responsible, Ethical, and Sustainable approach to effectively integrate AI into people and organizations. It's not just about adopting tools, but about designing processes, capabilities and decision criteria that raise performance without compromising security, privacy or social impact. ARES-AI guides how to prototype fast, measure value, mitigate bias and operate with governance.

competencies.title: The 13 Key Competencies
competencies.description: We develop a comprehensive set of competencies to think, build, and lead with AI, connecting foundations, tools and business practices for sustainable results.
competencies.c1_desc: Analyze information and make evidence-based decisions. Contrast sources, spot fallacies and evaluate trade-offs with explicit criteria.
competencies.c2_desc: Break down challenges and design scalable solutions. Define hypotheses, experiment and validate with data and real users.
competencies.c3_desc: Understand, analyze, and communicate with data. Select metrics, interpret results and narrate insights clearly.
competencies.c4_desc: Express technical ideas clearly to diverse audiences. Enable decisions by aligning context, risks and benefits.
competencies.c5_desc: Work in teams with clear roles and goals. Coordinate with product, data, engineering and business to deliver value.
competencies.c6_desc: Generate original ideas and valuable prototypes. Use AI to expand alternatives, explore styles and accelerate iterations.
competencies.c7_desc: Design user-centered systems and products. Balance technical feasibility, desirability and economic viability.
competencies.c8_desc: Orchestrate AI flows and agents for efficiency. Integrate APIs, RAG and tools for autonomous tasks with supervision.
competencies.c9_desc: Protect data and manage risks. Apply access controls, anonymization and regulatory compliance.
competencies.c10_desc: Assess impacts and mitigate bias. Establish usage boundaries, traceability and acceptability criteria.
competencies.c11_desc: Optimize resources and reduce environmental footprint. Design efficient processes and measure compute costs.
competencies.c12_desc: Update skills and working frameworks. Build improvement habits and evidence portfolios.
competencies.c13_desc: Guide teams and strategies with vision and governance. Prioritize initiatives, KPIs and responsible adoption at scale.

items.adopcion_01: Level of AI tool adoption in key processes
items.adopcion_02: Existence of AI adoption strategy and roadmap
items.seguridad_01: Security and privacy by design controls
items.integracion_01: AI integration into systems and processes

desc.adopcion_01: Evaluates how much AI solutions are used in critical business processes (not just isolated tests).
desc.adopcion_02: Evaluates if there is a plan/roadmap with prioritization and milestones for AI deployment.
desc.riesgos_01: Evaluates if AI-associated risks are identified, mitigated and monitored.
desc.etica_01: Evaluates if practices exist to avoid bias, harm and responsible use.
desc.seguridad_01: Evaluates privacy by design, access controls and data protection.
desc.capacidad_01: Evaluates team readiness to operate and maintain AI solutions.
desc.datos_01: Evaluates quality, governance and access to data needed for AI.
desc.gobernanza_01: Evaluates if roles, policies and committees exist to guide AI.
desc.valor_01: Evaluates if value KPIs are defined and results are measured.
desc.operacion_01: Evaluates monitoring, retraining and model observability.
desc.talento_01: Evaluates talent availability and upskilling plans.
desc.tecnologia_01: Evaluates platform, tools and MLOps suitability.
desc.integracion_01: Evaluates how well AI solutions integrate into the stack and processes.
desc.cumplimiento_01: Evaluates compliance with relevant norms and standards.
desc.transparencia_01: Evaluates explainability and traceability in AI decisions.
desc.sostenibilidad_01: Evaluates efficient resource use and environmental impact.
